description:
Hi guys! Welcome to my page. I live in the heart of Greenwich village. Just a 2 blocks to the heart of Soho and a 10 minute walk to the famous Meatpacking District.  My apartment is perfect for people coming to NYC to be in a great neighborhood, near great restaurants and the best shopping. Please message me with any questions. 

Last Renovation - 2016 (bathroom & kitchen)
name: Heart of Greenwich Village
